io.github.izdwuut.yarl.model.systems

Class WorldSystem

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.badlogic.ashley.core.EntitySystem
      • io.github.izdwuut.yarl.model.systems.WorldSystem

  • public class WorldSystem
extends com.badlogic.ashley.core.EntitySystem
    Logic related to a World. This system doesn't process entities, but is retrievable from an Ashley engine.
    Since:
    2017-12-12
    Author:
    Bartosz "izdwuut" Konikiewicz
